      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(User user)
                throws DuplicateUserPseudoException,
                       DuplicateUserEmailException,
                       DuplicateUserException
        Adds an user's clone to the users, returns the result and update the JSON file. There can't be two users with the same
        Parameters:
        user - the User object to add to the users field.
        Returns:
        boolean, if the clone has been added.
        Throws:
        NullUserException - when the clone is null.
        DuplicateUserPseudoException - when the pseudo given is already taken.
        DuplicateUserEmailException - when the email given is already taken.
        DuplicateUserException - when the pseudo and email given are already taken.

      • isUsedPseudo

        public boolean isUsedPseudo(java.lang.String pseudo)
        Returns if the pseudo is already used.
        Parameters:
        pseudo - String, the pseudo to verify.
        Returns:
        if the pseudo is already used.

      • isUsedEmail

        public boolean isUsedEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Returns if the email is already used. Not case-sensitive.
        Parameters:
        email - String, the email to verify.
        Returns:
        if the email is already used.
